metadata.title: Venera AI | Healthcare with AI
metadata.description: Web application to automate medical data processing and medical insights extracting. Insights visualizes. diagnosis recommender.

hero.headline: Meet Venera AI
hero.subheadline: Your fast & easy personal health companion

introduction.headline: Smarter Health, Simplified
introduction.body: Venera AI goes beyond storing your health records, we help you understand them. With AI-powered insights, seamless data integration, and personalized guidance, we turn complex medical information into clear, actionable steps. Take control of your health with confidence, all in one place.

functionalities.headline: Take control of your health, all in one place

items.headline: Upload your medical records effortlessly
items.body: Easily upload your medical records by scanning documents, images, or syncing with patient portals.

items.name: Elvira Montanez
items.body: Venera AI has completely changed how I manage my health. I no longer have to dig through multiple portals to find my records—everything is in one place, and the AI explanations make it so easy to understand!

items.name: Casper Berkley
items.body: As a caregiver, keeping track of my dad’s medical history used to be overwhelming. With Venera AI, I can access his records, monitor his vitals, and even get quick explanations of test results—all in seconds.

items.name: Daniel Gallego
items.body: The AI chatbot is a game-changer! I can ask questions about my lab results anytime and get clear, simple explanations without waiting for a doctor's appointment. It gives me peace of mind.
